document.masterDocTitle: A review of mites of the subfamily Speleognathinae (Acariformes: Ereynetidae) parasitizing respiratory tracts of birds in the Afrotropical region

not
Speleognathus Boyd 1948
[=
Boydaia sturni ( Boyd 1948 )
],
Fain 1958b : 179
.

Boydaia (Coboydaia) nigra ,
Fain 1971 : 101
, 102, 107, figs. 21, 38–40, 1972: figs. 2, 5–6, 8–12;
Fain et al . 1977

; Fain & Goff 1980: 506.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Boydaia (Coboydaia) nigra nigra , Fain 1955b
; Fain & Hyland 1975: 207.

Type host:
Serinus sulphuratus shelleyi (Neumann)
( Passeriformes : Fringillidae ) from Rwanda.

Diagnosis. Hypostome with 2 pairs of setae. Setae ve present. Setae vi and si situated almost on same transverse level. Sensillae SEa-type. Agenital and pseudanal series with 2 pairs of setae, each. Number of leg setae: coxae 2– 1–1–0, trochanters 0–0–0–0, femora 6–4–3–1, genua 4–4–3–2, tibiae 5–3–2–3. In larvae, antaxial and paraxial claws of leg I short, subequal, and sharp-ended.

Motacillidae :
MOtacilla flava Linnaeus
from Rwanda [ Southern Prov., Nyakibanda] ( Fain 1969 ),
M. aguimp vidua Sundevall
from Rwanda [ Southern Prov., Butare and Northern Prov., Gakoma] ( Fain 1969 ),
M. capensis Linnaeus
from Burundi [ Bujumbura ] ( Fain 1963d ) and from
South Africa
[Johannesburg] ( Fain 1959 ).

Passeridae :
Passer griseus Reichenow
from Rwanda [Southern Prov., Butare] ( Fain 1956a ).

Non-African hosts and distribution. Acrocephalidae :
AcrOcephalus arundinaceus arundinaceus (Linnaeus)
from Belgium (Fain 19 63d),
A. scirpaceus scirpaceus (Hermann)
from Belgium ( Fain 1963a ).

Emberizidae :
Emberiza citrinella Linnaeus
from Ukraine (Zabludovskaya 2012),
E. rutila Pallas
from Belgium (Fain 19 63d) and Russia (Zabludovskaya 1998), E. aureOla (Pallas),
E. pusilla (Pallas)
,
E. rustica (Pallas)
, E. spOdOcephala (Pallas),
E. tristrami (Swinhoe)
, all from Russia (Zabludovskaya 1998),
Spizella passerina (Bechstein)
from USA (Fain & Hyland 1970).

Fringillidae :
Carduelis carduelis carduelis (Linnaeus)
from Belgium (Fain 1962),
CarpOdacus erythrinus (Pallas)
from Russia (Zabludovskaya 1998),
Fringilla cOelebs
Linnaeus and F. mOntifringilla Linnaeus from Russia (Zabludovskaya 1998) and Ukraine (Zabludovskaya 2012),
EuphOnia viOlacea
(Linnaeus) from
Trinidad and Tobago
( Fain & Aitken 1968 ),
HaemOrhOus mexicanus (Mueller)
from USA (Fain & Hyland 1975).

Icteridae :
Icterus spurius (Linnaeus)
from
Mexico
and USA (Fain & Hyland 1970),
I. galbula (Linnaeus)
from USA (Fain & Hyland 1970).

Motacillidae :
Anthus spinOletta
(Linnaeus) from USA (Pence 1973a),
A. trivialis
from Russia (Zabludovskaya 1998),
A. trivialis trivialis Linnaeus
from Belgium ( Fain 1963a ),
MOtacilla alba Linnaeus
and
M. flava Linnaeus
both from Russia , Kirghizia (Zabludovskaya 2002) and Ukraine (Zabludovskaya 2012).

Passeridae :
Passer dOmesticus
(Linnaeus) from Hawaii (Fain & Goff 1980), Turkmenistan (Zabludovskaya 1998), Ukraine (Zabludovskaya 2012), P. ammOdendri Gould from Turkmenistan (Zabludovskaya 1998), P. mOntanus (Linnaeus) from Turkmenistan (Zabludovskaya 1998) and Ukraine (Zabludovskaya 2012), P. hispaniOlensis (Temminck), from Kazakhstan and Turkmenistan (Zabludovskaya 1998).
